application.doc: Delete a selection of API Access Control Resource Servers

param.name: instance_name
param.doc: The name of the Reverse Proxy Instance.

method.name: PUT
method.id: Delete a selection of API Access Control Resource Servers
method.doc: To delete a selection of API Access Control Resource Servers with the RESTful web service, issue an HTTP PUT command on the API Access Control resource server URI.
Note that prior to running this web service the Verify Access administrator credential must be stored using the Store the Verify Access administrator credentials web service.

param.name: Accept:application/json
param.doc: Required for requests to the service

param.name: command
param.doc: The command to run. This should be set to DELETE to delete a selection of resource servers.

param.name: resource_servers
param.doc: The list of resource servers to delete.
